author: EXM7777
text:
if you master AI video generation rn, i don't see how you're not printing money...

seriously, the opportunities are everywhere:
- full video production agencies you can run solo
- automated tiktok/instagram content
- faceless youtube channels
- AI ads for businesses

anyone can generate video... but almost nobody has taste

(and taste isn't something you're born with, it's something you build by studying what's good)

spend 2-3 weeks just watching, analyzing, deconstructing great videos...

you can become the person businesses pay for, not another slop producer

the market is desperate for quality and almost nobody's providing it
